profileSummary: Full-Stack Engineer & AI Product Builder with over 8 years of experience shipping end-to-end web applications and AI-powered products. As a founder, I've built scalable platforms that process millions of events and integrate deeply with LLMs and agent-based systems. My expertise spans Next.js, TypeScript, React, and Node.js, with hands-on experience architecting LLM pipelines, semantic search, and automated classification systems. I thrive in fast-paced environments where rapid prototyping and experimentation drive product innovation.
